entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023
